image: 
trip teaser: 
Skiathos, Peuki, Raches, Evia and other Beautiful places are destinations for kite surfing and kite boarding.

Windtrips team decide to promote its new feature by giving you the opportunity to follow us to some of the scheduled sporsdes boat trips for summer 2014

Sporades  & Evia boatrip is amazing trip from kiteboarding

item.title: Kiteboarding Road trip Safari in Greece
item.description:
image: 
trip teaser: 
Kiteboarding safaris / trips in Greece. Flat lagoons, waves, downwinds and many more. A road-trip that we will never forget. Be Greek for a week.

If you really want to see the best kitespots around the mainland of Greece, then come with us for a guided kiteboarding road-trip. Kite ,eat, sleep where the locals do and chase the wind. Everyday is a new adventure to some of the best unknown spots around. Get the chance to see the real greece and not only the crowded tourists places

frontpage image: 
Frontpage slogan: 

Guided kite trips around Greece. Crystal clear waters, sick flat and wavy spots, amazing downwinds and nice greek food.

read more
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Dodecanese kitetrip
item.description:
image: 

Intro: Kitesurfing Trip at Dodecanese islands

We set sail for Southern Dodecanese (twelve islands). A place full of wind and ideal kitespots which, combined with the astonishing medieval architecture of the islands, is a true heaven on earth.

frontpage image: 
Frontpage slogan: 

Greek Islands, sailing & kiteboarding. Visit with us for the best Dodecanese Kitesurfing Spots.

item.title: How high are fuel expenses for a weeklong Windtrip?
item.description: A Windtrip with a Catamaran or Monohull boat type is quite inexpensive in terms of fuel costs. With favourable wind the costs may not exceed 100€. In case of heavy use of the boat’s engines fuel costs can reach 300€ to 400€ depending on miles travelled, the boat’s mass and a fuel unit’s price at the given time. In case of a Motor Yacht fuel costs rise and can be calculated according to the particular boat’s manual.
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Getting to the harbour.
item.description:
Our boats sail out from harbours-bases located near international airports that handle numerous scheduled (Olympic Airways, Aegean Airlines) and chartered flights. If Athens is your starting point then you have many options (Emirates, British Airways, Czech Airlines, Swiss, KLM, Alitalia, Delta Airlines, Iberia, Air France, Lufthansa, US Airways, Air Arabia, Cyprus Airways). See more

read more

item.title: Ionian islands kitetrip
item.description:
image: 
trip teaser: 
<br />

Intro: kitesurfing Trip in Ionian Islands

Ionian Sea is an arm of the Mediterranean Sea at Greece’s west coast. The Ionian Sea Islands are gorgeous and the wind patterns that prevail in these waters create excellent conditions for successful Kitesurfing Trips.
The Islands of Kerkyra (Corfu), Paxoi, Lefkas, Ithaki and Zakinthos (Zante) will seduce you with turquoise coloured waters and their long beaches of fine sand. Wind here is reliably constant, blowing at 15-30 knots, ideally suited to kitesurfing and sailing.

frontpage image: 
Frontpage slogan: 

Ionian islands catamaran kitesurfing trip The best spots of the word. Corfu, Lefkada, Paxoi, Kefalonia and more private islands for you.

Video ID @ vimeo page: 
12746949

read more

item.title: Cyclades islands kitetrip
item.description:
image: 
trip teaser: 
<p> Αν θέλετε να ζήσετε μια μοναδική εμπειρία τότε σίγουρα βρίσκεστε στο σωστό μέρος. Με κινητήρια δύναμη τον άνεμο το windtrips.com διοργανώνει μοναδικές κρουαζιέρες στα μοναδικά ελληνικά νησιά του Αιγαίου.</p>

Intro: Kitesurfing Trip in Cyclades islands

If cruising the open sea is a dream for you, moreover, if you feel active and adventurous then our activity cruises is what you' ve been looking for. Windtrips.com specializes in kitesurfing & kiteboarding-themed cruises around the Aegean islands of Cyclades inspired by the  wind, the force filling our sails and kites.

frontpage image: 
Frontpage slogan: 

The best holiday of your life.Greek Islands, sailing & kitesurfing. Paros, Naxos, Santorini, Mykonos and more islands in one trip

Video ID @ vimeo page: 
11239078
